# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = split(text, "\n")
    for (i, line) in enumerate(lines)
        if length(line) > text_width
            # 找到最后一个在 text_width 内的单词
            end_idx = findlast(w -> length(w) <= text_width, split(line)) - 1
            # 如果找到，则在 end_idx + 1 处插入换行符
            if end_idx > 0
                lines[i] = line[1:end_idx] * "\n" * line[(end_idx + 2):end]
            end
        end
    end
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# 示例
text = "Hello World This is a very long sentence that should wrap at the 10-character mark."
wrap_string(text, 10) == "Hello World This\nis a very long\nsentence that\nshould wrap at\nthe 10-character mark."  # True
